articles.title: 'Golda' Review: Helen Mirren as a Woman at War - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The Oscar winner plays Golda Meir, Israel’s first female prime minister, during the days in 1973 when she led her country through the life-and-death struggle of the Yom Kippur War
